news.title: Twitter Acquires Screen-Sharing Social App Squad

news.title: LinkedIn Begins Testing Ads in LinkedIn Stories
news.description: After it released LinkedIn Stories to all users in September, LinkedIn has started to test Stories Ads with a limited number of advertisers in a closed beta with all members globally.

news.title: Twitter Reverts to Traditional Retweet Process After Switching It Up for the US Election
news.description: The social media network had temporarily removed straight retweeting as an option in the US in October, requiring users to quote tweets, but this reduced sharing and user engagement.

news.title: Instagram Adds New Prompts to Help Stop Resurgences of COVID-19
news.description: Users in areas with surging cases will see a prompt connecting them to health authorities at the top of their feeds, while the quality of COVID-19 or vaccine search results will improve.

news.title: FTC Orders Amazon, Facebook, Twitter and TikTok to Provide Details on Personal Data, Advertising
news.description: Several social media and streaming sites must provide information about personal data usage and advertising and user engagement practices, including their impact on children and teens.

news.title: LinkedIn Adds New 'Products' Tab on Company Pages to Highlight Specific Products
news.description: Companies can use the new feature for purposes such as spotlighting endorsements and testimonials, collecting ratings and reviews, and generating leads with a call to action button.
